settings.heading: LET US DO THE HEAVY LIFTING
Men’s skincare shouldn’t be confusing – it should get the job done without the headache.

settings.text: Our easy-to-use system has everything a guy needs to keep their skin looking good with (4) simple, high-impact steps that specifically target concerns men face on the daily: rough skin, buildup, razor burn/bumps, ingrowns and yes, even breakouts and wrinkles.

settings.heading: Just follow the numbers and we'll take care of the rest.

settings.text: Please note exact shipment times may vary. To customize future shipments and changes, email customer service anytime at info@elvylab.comApproximately two month after your first order is shipped, and then approximately every two months thereafter, you will be sent a new shipment of ELVY Lab-Essentials 4 piece kit. Each shipment will be charged to the payment method you provide today, before the next shipment for $74.99 unless you email to cancel. There is no commitment and no minimum to buy.All orders are subject to applicable sales tax.

settings.heading: The Steps
settings.content:
Step 1: Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser – get rid of the gunk while smoothing roughness.

Step 2: Brightening Serum – let go of the discoloration and help slow-down skin aging.

Step 3: Replenishing Moisturizer – gets your skin back to a strong, stress-free place.

Step 4: Toning & Firming Eye Cream – look like you got more sleep than you did.

settings.heading: How to Use
settings.content:
Step 1: Wet your skin and apply Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser to your face and neck but watch out for the eyes. Rub it all over and focus on areas that are stressing you out like clogged pores, ingrowns and razor bumps. Rinse it off, towel dry and move it along.

Step 2: Go in with 1-2 pumps of Brightening Serum, rubbing it in everywhere you cleansed and let it absorb until your skin feels dry again. No need to rinse this time.

Step 3: Just like Step 2, go in with 1-2 pumps of Replenishing Moisturizer and rub it in. If your skin feels tight or dry and you
wanted to use some more, go for it.

Step 4: Squeeze out a pea-sized amount of Toning & Firming Eye Cream onto the metal tip and sweep under the eye. Go around the entire eye area in a circular motion to include the cheek and brow bones and that’s it. Two circle-arounds is all you need.

Now step back and think about how easy that was for how good
your skin looks.

We told you so.

settings.heading: Go-To Ingredients for Guys
settings.content:
Exfoliating Acids: Clogged pores, ingrowns/razor bumps 

Vitamin C: Dark spots/discoloration 

Shea Butter: Flakey/rough skin 

Caffeine: Dark circles/eye bags 

‎

Full Ingredient Lists: 

Gentle Exfoliating Cleanser: DI Water (Aqua), Sodium Lauroyl Methylisethionate, Lactic acid, Glycolic acid, Vaccinum Myrtillus Fruit Extract, Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, Citric acid, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Fruit extract, Citrus Limon (Lemon) Fruit Extract, Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, Tartaric acid, Mallic acid, Propanediol, Sodium Lauroyl Oat Amino acids, Glycerin, Betaine Salicylate, Caffeine, Menthol, Polyquaternium-10, Caprylyl Glycol, Methyl Propanediol, Fragrance 

 

Brightening Serum: DI Water (Aqua), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Glyceryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Ethoxydiglycol, Chondrus Crispus extract, Sodium Hyaluronate,Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Ceratonia Siliqua(seed) Extract, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pullulan, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Ferulic Acid, Carnosine, Heptapeptide-7, Xanthan Gum, Propanediol, Citric acid, Lecithin, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzoic acid, Sorbic acid, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Powder, Allantoin, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance 

 

Replenishing Moisturizer: DI Water(Aqua),Caprylic Capric Triglyceride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20,C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate, Octyldodecanol, Butyrospermum Parkii ( Shea)Butter, Hordeum Vulgare (Seed) Extract, Chondrus Crispus extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dimethicone, Stearoxymethicone, Dimethicone Copolymer, Dimethiconol, Behenyl Alcohol, Saccharomyces Ferment, Lauroyl Lysine, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Lecithin, Glycerin, Erythritol, Hibiscus Sabdariffa Fruit   Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis ( Jojoba) Seed oil, Dunaliella Salina Extract, Ceramide, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethyl Hexylglycerin, Hexylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Laurate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Fragrance 

 

Firming & Toning Eye Cream: DI Water(Aqua), Octyldodecanol, Lecithin, C12-16 Alcohols, Palmitic acid, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Ethyl Hexyl Palmitate, Chenopodium Quinoa (Seed) Extract, Fructose, Glycerin, Aesculus Hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) Extract, Bidens Pilosa (Revinage)Extract, Elaeis Guineensis, Gossypium Herbaceum (Cotton) Seed Oil, Linum Usitatissimum (Linseed) Seed Oil, Pullulan, Behenyl Alcohol, Caprylic Capric Triglyceride, Butylene Glycol, Zerumbone, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Lecithin, Caffeine, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Menthyl Ethyl Amido Oxalate,Sodium Phytate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Laurate, Glyceryl Undecylenate, Fragrance

settings.heading: Shipping & Returns
settings.content:
You’ll get an email upon order, when it’s shipped, and when it arrives!

For returns, please contact us from our Connect page or at info@elvylab.com

settings.heading: HOW TO USE
settings.description: Video tutorial for the ELVY Lab Regimen

settings.title: Jalal Z.
settings.review: I just received my package and I love everything from the packaging to the way the products smell. Everything glides so smoothly and leaves no residue. The numbers make it extremely quick and simple for me to use the products. I instantly feel the freshness and tightness on my skin. I am an avid user of skincare and can confidently say this product is bomb! Way better than anything else out there. I’ve found my new favorite go-to daily skincare!

settings.title: Diego Perez
settings.review:
Now I was looking for something to help me with my dry yet oily skin. Its hard to find the right product to help with the aging skin so consequently was digging around on line and have found the Mecca of all skin care Regimens! The products are easy to 
Use and it makes me look way younger and get great compliments. No look further they don’t let you down!

settings.title: Venky
settings.review: Absolutely love this regimen! There are so many great things to be said about these products. It feels amazing on my skin and the fragrance makes you feel like you are in a luxury spa. The standout is the eye cream with its built-in applicator that makes it easy for you to get it done right! Having made the switch from Lumin, what truly defines the simple and easy to use Elvy Lab regimen is the design of the products, big bold numbers and clear text for step by step use, the pump system which means no wasting time opening jars or taking lids of bottles, all of which helps shave off those precious seconds in the morning, to accomplish a complete skincare routine, all in under 2 minutes! An excellent concept, that handles each component for guys too busy scrambling around, that don’t need to look elsewhere anymore.

settings.title: A.D.
settings.review: I have been looking for a good skincare routine for a long time now. Came across this brand and got myself a kit. And I like the luxurious look and feel of this brand and the bottles are so slick and fits anywhere easily. I travel a lot so and its TSA friendly and not only that I can fit all my other toiletries in the bag too. I have used this kit for a month and I have been getting a lot of compliments from everyone on how much my skin has improved. I am hooked!!!

settings.title: Leah
settings.review: Bought this for my husband and finally I can say my job of keeping my man looking good is now done! His skin looks so amazingly clean and glowy. Highly recommend

settings.title: Aman S
settings.review: What a great way to get ready for the holidays with the arrival of my Elvy Lab skincare regimen! Amazing product and in the perfect size too. Travel is going to feel so much better now with finally being able to keep my skincare in my carryon. Ready to enter into the new year looking my best thanks to skincare by Elvy Lab!

settings.title: C. K.
settings.review: This regimen has changed the way I manage my skin care, and it definitely shows. I’ve had numerous people comment on how nice my skin looks and with just 5 minutes every morning it keeps getting better! I love how easy each product is to apply and with numbered bottles, you can’t mess this up. The under eye applicator is a game changer!

settings.title: Mark
settings.review:
Waking up with my face feeling just as good, and looking as fresh and bright, as it does all day is the reason why I can't stop obsessing about the amazing new skincare products from Elvy Lab. The oh so easy to follow regimen actually makes you want to take care of your face day and night. To the team behind Elvy Lab, great job. 
Well it's time for my PM regimen now!
